text: Louis "Lou" Danziger (born November 17, 1923) is an American graphic designer and design educator. He is known for his modern movement in graphic design. In 1998, Danziger was awarded the AIGA Gold Medal for “standards of excellence over a lifetime of work.” ==References== Category:1923 births Category:Living people Category:American teachers Category:Artists from New York City Category:Educators from New York City
title: Louis Danziger
